类型: Color: BlackSize: Fit for Waist Size 28''-32"
评论详情: This black embossed leather belt is a perfect everyday staple! The studs are subtle, giving it a timeless look compared to the oversized studs trending right now, but it still adds a fun, edgy vibe to my outfits. The length is just right—I'm a size 28 in jeans, and it fits perfectly. Definitely a cute and versatile addition to my wardrobe!

类型: Color: BlackSize: Fit for Waist Size 37''-40''
评论详情: This high quality embossed studded leather belt almost feels like real leather. It's soft like real leather.  I'm impressed with how well made this belt looks and feels. It features a real metal buckle and real metal studs. The embellished vines design are classic casual. The belt fits true to size just follow the size chart and you'll be fine. This belt has a nice weight and thickness to it like a way more expensive belt. It also easily fit the loops of my jeans. Sometimes it's a issue when belts are too large for jean loops and don't lay flat. This is not that kind of belt it fits and lays flat! This is also a comfortable belt and the holes line up with the pin so I don't have to add any holes. This is just a really nice belt.

评论概述: As expected - appropriate length and quality
类型: Color: BrownSize: Fit for Waist Size 37''-40''
评论详情: This belt was just as I expected - it's faux leather, so not sure how long it will last, but it's a nice belt.  Under-stated brown color, with touches of imprint accents and studs that stand out just a bit, but not too much.  Overall, I look forward to wearing this either at my waist or below, with pants or dresses/skirts that need a bit of attention or cinching at the waist.  Good purchase at $14.99.

评论概述: Like the design of this belt

评论详情: I got his belt because I liked the embossing on it. I’ve used it a few times and feel that it’s durable and a great quality belt. I like the design and look of it. The little studs and embossed design gives any outfit a nice touch. I noticed it gives my fall outfits a cuter look. Sometimes something as simple as a belt can really add pizzazz to an outfit. Highly recommend this.  I’ll update this review if anything changes.

类型: Color: BlackSize: Fit for Waist Size 33''-36''
评论详情: I got this belt based on their sizing chart and it was spot on. It has a very light imprint on it and the studs and buckle are understated so you can wear this belt with any type of outfit. I’m very happy with the width also because I am short waisted at 5’3” and that can make a huge difference in the look.

类型: Color: BlackSize: Fit for Waist Size 37''-40''
评论详情: This is a very nice belt and I like the look of it. I went by waist size and it was a little shorter than I wanted. Normally I expect that the belt will fit through at least one loop, but mine barely fit even though my waist size was on the low end of the range that I ordered. I suggest getting one size larger than you think you need.
